full_threads.body:
Hi Josephine,

I hope you had an awesome weekend.

We have updated the layout. Please see the attached image.

Hi Joel,

The footer form & floating form are not properly adjusted. Please see attached photos.

Could you please adjust the alignment to center it on the desktop view and fix the floating view on the desktop as well?

Additionally, please adjust the alignment of the footer form in the mobile view to center it and extend it slightly to provide enough space for writing. Also, fix the floating form in the mobile view.

Kindly send me images once the adjustments are made.

Thanks.

Kind regards,
Josephine



Josephine Roufaiel
Managing Director

venEyes 3D Printed Customised Eyewear
Ph: 02 7228 9228 | M: +61 422 066 357
josephine@veneyes.com.au | www.veneyes.com.au
19/591 Withers Road, Rouse Hill NSW 2155

Please consider our environment before printing this e-mail. This e-mail is confidential and should be read only by the intended recipient. If you are not the intended recipient, please notify us immediately by telephone or email and destroy and delete this message from your computer.

Hi Josephine,

I hope all is well

We have updated the footer form.
Could you please confirm if it's okay to close this ticket? If not, please update the customer or add notes if this ticket needs to remain open or pending. Thanks!
@joel please check if we still need to action this or omkay to close

Hi Joesphine,

No problems - we'll take care of of this and confirm.
Hey @glen - can you stack this form to be vertical instead of horizontal (desktop and mobile). Thank you

full_threads.body: Just a friendly reminder that this ticket has been open for over 5 days. Please close it if it's resolved or follow up if necessary. Thanks!

Hi Joel,

No need to do those changes below. I have made them.

Please amend only the subscriber form at the footer so the form be vertical on top of each other on desktop & mobile so people can have space to write.

Thanks.

Kind regards,
Josephine

Hi Joel,

The menu submenus don't appear on all pages or appears on top of page but below the Wishlist heart or without background so it lost on page. Please see below.

Also the cart icon should show the ordered items through hover & open the cart page on click. Same as on desktop. Please try to add something on the cart on desktop version & see how the icon works on hover or on click. Not necessary hover function if doesn't work, but should open the cart page with ordered items.

Thanks.

Kind regards,
Josephine
